1.Name: Iceblade Dance
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Executes a series of graceful slashes with an ice blade, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Dry Ice Field
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 60% more Anomaly Buildup.
